Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Wow... the colour is so beautiful, like an amethyst. Thanks!
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)SkillBook_4: Hey, this is my favourite magazine! My Dad won't let me have a subscription, so I have to get it on the black market like this...$h
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)66: $c 0.5#Wow... it's just my colour! Thanks, @!$h#Thank you! This is my favourite stone. It's so pretty.
Entries.GreenRain: I want to go exploring, but I can tell my mum is kind of worried. I don't want to add to her stress.
Entries.cc_Begin: Don't tell anyone, but I sneaked into the old community centre last night... I think it's haunted!
Entries.wonEggHunt_memory_oneyear: I'm still mad that you beat me at the egg hunt last year. You'd better start practising...
Entries.dating_Sebastian_memory_oneday: I heard you and Sebastian started dating... I didn't realise you guys had a thing...$6
Entries.movieTheater: Did you hear about the new cinema in town? I'm excited to check it out!$h
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?#$e#Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyway.$h
Entries.secondChance_Girls: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you any more, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$s
Entries.Fri: Wow, I just realised it's Friday. $u#$e#Sometimes I totally lose track of time.
Entries.Event_Rain_2: Yea... I guess you would be one to appreciate this sombre ambience.
Entries.summer_1: Summer's here. It's not really my favourite season.#$e#The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.
Entries.summer_6: I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.#$e#Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real any more.
Entries.summer_Sat: I'm looking forward to autumn... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*
Entries.summer_Sun: Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... pretend you just won a free holiday. Where would you go?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall
Entries.summer_Sun_old: $p 25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbours someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.$h
Entries.fall_1: Ah... Autumn's here!$h#$e#I was getting so tired of summer.
Entries.fall_Wed: I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.$h#$e#The Spirit's Eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.
Entries.fall_Sat: $d cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Centre all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
Entries.fall_Fri10: I usually feel lonely this time of year, but not any more.$l#$e#@, what are your plans for the future?
Entries.winter_Tue: Doesn't a steaming cup of hot chocolate sound good right now?
Entries.winter_Fri: One thing I've learnt living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
Entries.winter_Tue4: It's so cold, I wish we had a cup of hot chocolate to share.$h
